source:
TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Mauwyl wears an increasingly uneasy expression.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>Règle spéciale<var 1D /var>:  synchronisation de quête<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Mauwyl aimerait vous demander encore un peu d'aide.

source:
TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_SEQ_01<tab>Mauwyl once again worries for Tolas, who has yet to return from making his rounds. Worried that harm may have befallen his friend, he suggests that the two of you split up and search for the knight. The young woodcutter will return and search within the Imperative, and bids you search without.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_SEQ_01<tab>* <var 1A 02 /var>Cette quête est <var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> synchronisée<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> avec votre niveau.<var 1A 01 /var>

Mauwyl vous a demandé de l'aider à retrouver son ami Tolas, qui semble mettre beaucoup de temps à terminer sa ronde. Allez dans la forêt du Berger égaré et cherchez Tolas.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_SEQ_02<tab>Scouring the woods, you find an ashen-faced Tolas cowering before a vicious monster. As the veteran knight seems, for reasons unknown, too terrified to swing his blade, you take it upon yourself to slay the fiend and come to his aid.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez trouvé Tolas alors qu'il faisait face à un monstre, et l'en avez débarrassé. Aidez-le à se relever.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_SEQ_03<tab>You make quick work of the beast, rescuing Tolas from a fate most dire. The knight ruefully discloses that he has found himself unable to fight ever since the recent battle, with the events of that day tormenting his conscience even still. He assails himself as a coward who valued his own safety over the lives of his men, and declares himself unworthy to carry on his grandfather's name. In the end, he returns to the stronghold to think over matters, pleading you not to divulge his secret shame to his friend.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez secouru Tolas. Il semble victime d'un traumatisme après avoir vu ses compagnons périr dans l'attaque des purgateurs sans parvenir à les sauver. Allez maintenant parler à Mauwyl pour faire le point.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_SEQ_04<tab>Back at the Imperative, Mauwyl expresses his gratitude to you for bringing Tolas back safe and sound. He nevertheless remains concerned for his friend, who he says has barely uttered a word since his return. You resolve to sojourn at the stronghold a bit longer, that you might help the troubled knight dispel his demons.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_SEQ_04<tab>Vous avez retrouvé Mauwyl sans toutefois lui dire ce que vous avez appris. Ce dernier est encore très inquiet pour son ami...
TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TODO_02<tab>Parler à Mauwyl à L'Impératif d'Ostall

source: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_MAUWYL_000_000<tab>Whatever is keeping Tolas? He should have returned from his rounds by now. Do you suppose he's forgotten about us?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_MAUWYL_000_000<tab>Dis, tu ne trouves pas que Tolas met du temps à rentrer<var 1D /var>? Il devait juste faire une ronde autour du château, il devrait avoir fini depuis longtemps... Est-ce qu'il a oublié qu'on l'attendait ici<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_MAUWYL_000_001<tab>...No, that wouldn't be like him. Call it a hunch, but I have a bad feeling about this. Let's split up and look for him. I'll go see if he's returned to the stronghold. Why don't you search around outside?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_MAUWYL_000_001<tab>J'ai un mauvais pres<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ment. Je vais chercher à l'intérieur du château. Tu veux bien t'occuper de chercher à l'extérieur, pendant ce temps<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TOLAS_000_010<tab><pant> <pant> Thank you, friend. You...you saved my life. Oh, the ignominy of it all...
target: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TOLAS_000_010<tab>Pfff, pfff... merci... Je vous dois une fière chandelle. Vous m'avez trouvé dans un moment bien peu honorable.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TOLAS_000_011<tab>I, a knight and veteran of a thousand battles, nigh laid low by some puny beast I should have been able to slay with mine eyes closed. And yet, the moment I drew my sword, my arm began to tremble...
target: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TOLAS_000_011<tab>Je fais vraiment honte à mon titre de chevalier, à m'être fait mettre en difficulté par de tels monstres. En temps normal, je pourrais les vaincre les yeux fermés, pourtant... mais dès que j'ai dégainé mon épée, ma main tremblait.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TOLAS_000_012<tab>Ever since that day it has been like this. I had lost men to the sin eaters before, of course...but this time was different. So powerful was our foe, so crushing was our defeat. I can still hear the screams of my men echoing endlessly throughout my skull.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TOLAS_000_012<tab>C'est comme ça depuis le jour de l'attaque. J'avais déjà assisté à leurs attaques auparavant, mais cette fois, c'était différent. Ils étaient si nombreux... mes camarades n'ont rien pu faire et sont tombés comme des mouches.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TOLAS_000_013<tab>Why, damn it!? Why do I still live when they had to die!? But no, I know the answer... It is because I am a coward. I could have risked my life to save them, yet I fought only to preserve my own worthless hide.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TOLAS_000_013<tab>Et si j'ai survécu, c'est parce que je les ai abandonnés... Je ne faisais que défendre, et j'avais du mal à simplement ne pas me faire tuer... Alors que j'aurais dû essayer de les sauver<var 1D /var>! J'aurais pu le faire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TOLAS_000_014<tab>My superiors, my fellow soldiers sing my praises only because they do not know the truth. If they did, I would be cast out of the guard in dishonor. I am a craven, unworthy of my grandfather's blood.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TOLAS_000_014<tab>Si mes supérieurs savaient quel lâche, quel homme abject je suis, ils me chasseraient sûrement de mon unité. Je ferais vraiment honte à mes ancêtres, s'ils m'observent depuis l'au-delà<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TOLAS_000_015<tab>I beg of you, friend. Do not speak to the others─Mauwyl, in particular─of my terrible secret. I must carry the shame of my deeds on my own until such a day as I can redeem myself.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TOLAS_000_015<tab>Je vous en prie, ne parlez de tout ça à personne<var 1D /var>! Ni à mes camarades, ni à Mauwyl<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TOLAS_000_016<tab>And so I should tell him, you say? Indeed, Mauwyl's concern is touching. And yet...!
target: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TOLAS_000_016<tab>En parler à Mauwyl<var 1D /var>? C'est vrai qu'il s'est inquiété pour moi, mais...

source: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TOLAS_000_017<tab>You cannot agree? Mayhap you believe I should tell my friend? I know that he worries for me. And yet...!
target: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TOLAS_000_017<tab>Vous n'êtes pas d'accord... Vous pensez que je dois en parler à Mauwyl, c'est ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TOLAS_000_018<tab>I would ponder this matter alone. Pray leave me be for a while.
target: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_TOLAS_000_018<tab>... Désolé, je vais retourner au château de mon côté. J'ai besoin d'être un peu seul.

source: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_MAUWYL_000_031<tab>Thank you ever so much for tracking down Tolas! I am relieved indeed to see my friend safe and sound.
TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_MAUWYL_000_032<tab>And yet, he has barely spoken a word to me since his return! Whatever is the matter this time?
target: TEXT_LUCKZH302_03534_MAUWYL_000_032<tab>Il n'a pas bronché depuis son retour. Mais qu'est-ce qui lui est arrivé pendant sa ronde<var 1D /var>!?
